spec_data.Name: perl-MooseX-Workers
spec_data.Description:
MooseX::Workers is a Role that provides easy delegation of long-running
tasks into a managed child process. Process management is taken care of via
POE and it's POE::Wheel::Run module.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:13:23 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides a simple sub-process management for asynchronous tasks
